description: This Java class defines a mock cluster for testing PRM zones within a Zigbee/Zave-like device simulation. It extends MockZoneCluster to implement specific attribute behaviors such as configured zone type and zone configuration, and overrides methods for handling attribute data serialization and deserialization.

classes.name: MockPRMZoneCluster
classes.description: A mock cluster class for PRM zones used for testing, supporting specific manufacturing attributes and custom behavior for attribute handling.

methods.name: MockPRMZoneCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the mock PRM zone cluster with specific manufacturing attributes and default states.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Overridden method to retrieve byte-encoded attribute data based on AttributeInfo, handling custom manufacturing IDs and attributes.

methods.name: setAttributeData
methods.description: Overridden method to set attribute data from byte array input, updating internal state for specific attributes and handling byte order.
